product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Dining Table - Regular - Special Buy
long_description: Durable and easy to fold flat for packing, the ALPS Mountaineering Dining Table is a perfect match for outdoor dining, be it backyard, park, beach or campsite. Durable and smooth aluminum top unrolls into a spacious table that comfortably accommodates up to 4 people. Rugged aluminum X-frame has no interfering side supports so chairs can move up close. Tabletop and frame collapse quickly and slide easily into included transport/storage bag. Aluminum construction cleans up easily and is great for family camping, tailgating or backyard barbecues. Special buy.
short_description: Durable and easy to fold flat for packing, the ALPS Mountaineering Dining Table is a perfect match for outdoor dining, be it backyard, park, beach or campsite.
